  • What is League of Legends?
  • Game Modes
  • The Maps
  • Champion Type
  • Champion Selection
  • Item Selection
  • Closing

  • League of Legends

  • #1 Most played onine game
  • Made by Riot Games
  • Free to Play
  • MOBA (Multiple Online Battle Arena)

  • Game Modes

  • 5v5 Blind Pick
  • 5v5 Draft Mode
  • 5v5 Ranked Draft Mode
  • ARAM (All Random All Mid)

  • Game Mode Explanation


  • 5v5 - 2 Oppositing of 5 members each, on Summoners' Rift
  • Aram - All random 5v5 on Howling Abbys
  • Blind Pick - Champion selectionn is open
  • Draft Mode - Players pick champions 1 at a time, in a order
  • Ranked Draft Mode - Competitive Draft Mode that tracks progress (via Elo/MMR)

  • The Maps

  • Summoner's Rift - The 5v5 map,
    the most popular map,
    and also the largest (tri-lane)
  • Twisted Treeline - The 3v3 map,
    a medium sized map, quicker games,
    altar capture (semi tri-lane)
  • Howling Abyss - ARAM map, smallest map,
    spawning heald
    and mana weels (single lane)

Thank You
